DEF.Date-time: Date and time the session was started

Scan.Software-name: The name of the Software that did the scan
Scan.Software-version: The version of the Software that did the scan
Scan.Software-arguments: Arguments used to perform the scan

Finding.IdentifiedTimestamp: DateTime stamp for when we found this vulnerability
Finding.uniqueID: The Software unique ID for this Finding
Finding.Confidence: One of an agreed list of values
Finding.Background: More info on the type of issue
Finding.Remediation: Advise on how to fix the issue

Further-information.Further-info: More information about this specific issue

Classification.href: The URL to the Classification description

DataFlowElement.SourceFileName: The path and filename of the file the vulnerability was found in
DataFlowElement.LineText: The line where the vulnerability was found (This could be with x number of lines around it)
